title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. IX, pt. 370 - Procedures For Allocation Of Economic Development Power
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. IX, pt. 370 - Procedures For Allocation Of Economic Development Power

State Regulations
§ 370.1 - Applications
§ 370.2 - Notification and advertisement of available economic development power
§ 370.3 - Application review
§ 370.4 - Job and power usage requirements
§ 370.5 - Requirements and criteria for economic development power allocations
§ 370.6 - Allocation recommendations
§ 370.7 - Transfers of economic development power
§ 370.8 - Determinations of the board

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. IX, pt. 370

Statutory authority: Economic Development Law, §§
182-187

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
